remarks: A projection from a product of monoids to one of the factors is a monoid homomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
pwspjmhm.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwspjmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
pwspjmhm $p |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. V /\ A e. I ) -> ( x e. B |-> ( x ` A ) ) e. ( Y MndHom R ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d V x $.
